// src/components/AdminDashboard.js
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{database}from'../firebase';import{List,ListItem,ListItemText,Button,Typography,Box}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminDashboard=()=>{const[characters,setCharacters]=useState([]);const[selectedCharacter,setSelectedCharacter]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCharacters=async()=>{const snapshot=await database.ref('characters').once('value');const charactersData=snapshot.val();setCharacters(Object.values(charactersData||{}));};fetchCharacters();},[]);const handleEditCharacter=character=>{setSelectedCharacter(character);};const handleUpdateCharacter=updatedCharacter=>{database.ref('characters').child(updatedCharacter.id).update(updatedCharacter);setSelectedCharacter(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",children:"Characters List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{children:characters.map(character=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{button:true,onClick:()=>handleEditCharacter(character),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:character.title})},character.id))})]}),selectedCharacter&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",children:"Edit Character"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleUpdateCharacter(selectedCharacter),variant:"contained",color:"primary",children:"Update Character"})]})]});};export default AdminDashboard;
